__e: If you had been with me a few weeks ago, you would have seen the bodies of my people: : :
In this..... This is the dead body of my dad. This is my mom.
Oh, sure, sure, seems funny down here and now. But it don't feel so fucking funny in the middle of a murder case when you're seeing those girls dead!
AS FOR ME, I'VE GOT TO GET BACK TO MY CORPSE CATALOGUE AND DECIDE ON A MAJOR.
We have 16 bodies and no reason to believe we found all that are out there.
But every time you're out on a job you leave two or three bodies behind in bits and pieces.
I know what they ought to do with those goddamn corpses. ( Exclaims ) Have a nice, big bonfire. They'd rather be eaten alive than burn those bodies.
When relatives of the guests broke into the house in 1929 they found all 27 dead, from one cause or another.
- Because I have no skeletons in the closet.
He tried to get us to go to the cellar. He says 13 bodies are there.
You claim to have seen 2 corpses at the same hotel.
Falling for a story like that! Thirteen bodies buried in the cellar.
You know very well there are 13 bodies down in our cellar.
Didn't you hear about the boat that crashed with all those dead bodies onboard?
the streets will be strewn with the bodies of men... shooting themselves for your sake before I've done with you.
To remove dead bodies from the gas chambers.
